fieldToMatch.description: The part of a web request that you want AWS WAF to inspect. See Field to Match below for details.

regexString.description: The string representing the regular expression. **Note:** The fixed quota for the maximum number of characters in each regex pattern is 200, which can't be changed. See [AWS WAF quotas](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/waf/latest/developerguide/limits.html) for details.

textTransformations.description:
Text transformations eliminate some of the unusual formatting that attackers use in web requests in an effort to bypass detection.
At least one required.
See Text Transformation below for details.
